rukus.text: Ni de zhu ceng xialing shuo: Nimen yingdang zhi chongbai ta, yingdang xiaojing fumu. Ruguo ta lia zhong de yiren huozhe liang ren zai ni de tangshang dadao laomai, namo, ni buyao dui ta lia shuo:`Pei!'Buyao he chi ta lia, ni yingdang dui ta lia shuo you limao dehua.
Ni yingdang bigongbijing de fushi ta lia, ni yingdang shuo:`Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni lianmin ta lia, jiu xiang wo nian youshi ta lia yangyu wo nayang.
Nimen de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de xinqing de. Ruguo nimen shi shanliang de, namo, ta duiyu changchang huiguo zhe que shi zhi she de.
Ni yingdang ba qinqi, pinmin, luke suo ying de de zhouji fen gei tamen, ni buyao huihuo;
huihuo zhe que shi emo de pengyou, emo yuan shi gufu zhu en de.
Ruguo ni bixu qiu de ni suo xiwang de cong zhu jiang shi de enhui hou caineng zhouji tamen, namo, ni yinggai dui tamen shuo wenhe dehua.
Ni buyao ba ziji de shou shu zai bozi shang, ye buyao bashou wanquan shen kai, yimian ni biancheng huihen de shou zebei zhe.
Ni de zhu bi wei tasuo yiyu zhe er shi jiyang fuyu, bi wei tasuo yiyu zhe er shi jiyang jiongpo. Ni de zhu duiyu ta de zhong pu, que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de.
